name: Earthoids
description:
EARTHOIDS is an alien attack game like space invaders, where you must blast your way through different waves of aliens and boss fights to stay alive as long as you can.  Unlock different skins and ships to play as and share your best scores with your friends.  Simple controls, just tap to move left/right or drag the ship.

FEATURES:

🚀 Animated ship and aliens. 👾
🎵 Cool sound effects and music.
🕹️ Simple controls.
😲 The game gets harder the longer you survive.
💯 Share your best score and compete with friends.

DEVICE/CONTENT INFO:

🔹 Works on phones, tablets and Chromebooks (that support Android).
🔹 Small download size.
🔹 No notifications.
🔹 No in-app purchases.
🔹 No banner adverts distracting you during gameplay.
🔹 No permissions requested.
🔹 No personal data recorded or used.
🔹 No violent content, bad language or inappropriate adverts.

🆓 Earthoids is a 100% free space invaders, so download it today and start your own alien attack. 🆓

Please leave a rating in the playstore with your feedback.

If you like this game, please check out the other free games by Scaly Bob.
